articles.title: Ex-NFL QB Mark Sanchez released from custody a week after parking fight arrest and stabbing
articles.description:
INDIANAPOLIS — Former NFL quarterback and sports analyst Mark Sanchez was released from custody Sunday, about a week after police said he was stabbed during a fight with a truck driver outside an Indiana hotel. The Indianapolis Metropolitan Police Department confirmed Sanchez’s release. He faces a felony battery charge, along with several misdemeanor charges, for […]
